modName: SS's Hit Stop -- Intensify hit sense
summary:
When someone be hit , the attacker's weapon will be slow in a short time , just like the weapon inserted enemy's body .
(the slow weapon speed) = (the Old speed) *0.15 , continue 0.08 seconds .
Then you can feel you hit something , but not the air .
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][color=#6aa84f]Description :[/color]
[/size]
This is a hit-stop mod like TK_HitStop , but a little different . Maybe the visual effect is alike ,but the principle is different .

[size=2]It use [/size][size=3]"[b]stop weapon[/b]"[/size][size=2] ,rather than [/size][size=3]"[b]stop time[/b]"[/size][size=2] .
[/size]
When someone be hit , the attacker's weapon will be slow in a short time , just like the weapon inserted enemy's body .
Then you can feel you hit something , but not the air .

[/size][/color][youtube]tNcQv6SX5do[/youtube][youtube]B10n7ikRPG4[/youtube]
videos made by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2308248]ft2232240[/url]

[color=#6aa84f][size=4]Compatibility:[/size][/color]
This is just a simple mod , I don't think it will brawl will others , include Tk_HitStop .

[color=#6aa84f][size=4]Requirements:
[/size][/color]Since 2.0 version , need SkyUI and SKSE.

[color=#f1c232][size=4]Last: 
[/size][/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23681]TK HitStop[/url] is a great mod , just I don't like it .
To be honest ,sometimes the "time stop" make me sick .
I don't want to offend anyone , if I did , I'm sorry .
author: Sugar_Steak
